cause.description:
With the untimely passing of R’ Chaim Yonah Edelman in 2001 at the young age of 37, the need to help support his widow and their seven children ke”h with their day to day living expenses arose.
The name, Keren Chaim Yonah was chosen to carry on the legacy of this great person. With the meaning of Keren=Fund and Chaim Yonah in the memory of R’ Chaim Yonah o”h Edelman.
This non-profit organization was established to ease the need of his family and other widows and orphans in their day-to-day living expenses with cash grants and financial support.
Our organization is run completely by volunteers, we don’t have any overhead expenses and all our printing and supplies are donated. We are able to direct all your contributions to help those in need.
1. Sending money to widows every month so they can afford to live.
2. Helping Widows with Interest free loans
3. WWW.HELPKCY.ORG for more info
cause.mission: Help Widows and Orphans with their everyday living expenses
